xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/799177-Bhediya 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8ETdXcKad8kRRiCupDTjXrYzUv5.jpg Inspired by legendary folklore rooted in Arunachal Pradesh, Bhediya tells the story of Bhaskar, who after being bitten by a wolf, witnesses changes happening in his body. Discovering the powers of a wolf in him, Bhaskar transforms into a shape-shifting werewolf but is worried that the monster in him will be a threat to human existence in the local town. Bhediya
